description: Creamy and crunch snack with a hint of rosemary.
keywords: Jaffle & toastie,Pescatarian,Zucchini,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Peanut free
name: Zucchini Cheesy Toasties Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium zucchini, sliced at an angle to get 8 slices

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the sourdough bread slices in a toaster. Place zucchini slices under a grill on medium-high heat for 4 minutes to grill.
Now add the oil and rosemary to the slices of sourdough and the goats cheese.
Turn the zucchini slices over and grill everything again for another 4 minutes.
Serve the zucchini slices topped with goats cheese.
